verbs.description: [ARG1: It] [V: was] [ARG2: a dramatic turnaround for Trump , who has been insisting that his administration had no choice but to separate families apprehended at the border] .
It was a dramatic turnaround for Trump , who [V: has] been insisting that his administration had no choice but to separate families apprehended at the border .
It was a dramatic turnaround for Trump , who has [V: been] insisting that his administration had no choice but to separate families apprehended at the border .

It was a dramatic turnaround for Trump , who has been insisting that [ARG0: his administration] [V: had] [ARG1: no choice but to separate families apprehended at the border] .
It was a dramatic turnaround for Trump , who has been insisting that his administration had no choice but to separate [ARG1: families] [V: apprehended] [ARGM-LOC: at the border] .
